channel.title: Client help
channel.description: annyone knows...how to make players need to use my client to play my server source?annyone if u guy know show me how,thx

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:9, topic:177792”]Well, I was curious with the client so luckily I studied it long enough to find this.

When clicking login, have the client send the packet.

aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method397((byte)6, desired_packet_ID);

Then, have your server handle the packet in packetProcess().

case packetID:
dosomething;
break;

Maybe have it change a boolean so that the server only processes their player when it’s true.[/quote]where to search client.java?or class?

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Well, I was curious with the client so luckily I studied it long enough to find this.

When clicking login, have the client send the packet.

aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method397((byte)6, desired_packet_ID);

Then, have your server handle the packet in packetProcess().

case packetID:
dosomething;
break;

Maybe have it change a boolean so that the server only processes their player when it’s true.

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:5, topic:177792”][quote author=_Vengeance link=topic=238724.msg2027417#msg2027417 date=1201951310]
Make the client send a certain packet on connect, and if the server doesn’t receive the packet just drop the connection.
[/quote]
Or just have it send a packet before even connecting and have it allow the connection only if it’s recieved.[/quote]how to make it…example…most server they make own client rite…i have my own client…but most ppl using silab website on my server

Read full topic

item.title: Client help
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:177792”]try this

@echo off COLOR 09 title NigahScape Compile "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause [/quote]i mean,most ppl use silab to log in my server…i wanted my client
